desc: We are authorized Red Dingo distributors in South Africa. We are committed to the best quality pet accessories on the market. Nationwide delivery in South Africa 🇿🇦 with free shipping for purchases over R750. From collars and tags, to leads, harnesses, toys and jackets we’ve got everything your fur baby needs.

layout.text: Wind proof and fully reversible. New colours available.
